newsitem.title: USA: New York coal/ore/scrap fixtures - Sept 6.
newsitem.headline: New York coal/ore/scrap fixtures - Sept 6.

text.p: COAL - Nord Sea 140,000 long tons coal Puerto Prodeco/Ensted $5.50 15,000/35,000 1-15/10 Elsam.
Iolcos Pioneer 110,000 long tons coal Puerto Prodeco/Milaki $5.50 15,000/14,000 end Sept Glencore.
ORE - Eden 140,000 long tons ore Tubarao/Beilun and Baoshan $8.95 scale/30,000 end Sept Bao Trans.
Cape Africa 140,000 long tons ore W.Australia/Kure $3.85 scale/30,000 5-15/10 Tsuki Boshi.
Iolcos Eternity 100,000 long tons ore Port Cartier/Hansaport $5.30 five days 1-10/10 Preussag.
